title.rendered: ‘Gautam Gambhir asked me to open. Oppositions did not take me seriously’

content.rendered:
Amid of India vs WI T20 series, the Caribbean and ex KKR player SP Naraine recalled his experience with Gautam Gambhir.

“He had given me too much freedom during the IPL as Captain. He asked me to open and fast start, it did not matter to out early. As I was still new to the role, opposition did’t take me seriously, and I went from strength to strength,”

Naraine.

Read also: “A true heart of a lion and kind spirit” – Bear Grylls wants Kohli to appear on Man vs. Wild
